official_title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to designate a segment of the Flathead River in Montana as a component of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.

summary.text: Amends the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to designate a segment of the Flathead River in Montana as a component of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to designate a segment of the Flathead River in Montana as a component of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.
